website_summaries.verdict: For the cook on a budget, it's the perfect place to store precious kitchenware within easy reach.
pros: Compact cylindrical knife block can hold quite a few knives and looks great on a countertop
A weighted bottom keeps the block from toppling over
Much easier to clean than a traditional wooden knife block
Plastic slots keep your blades sharp longer
cons: Smaller knives may not stay in place as well as larger ones in this knife block

customer_reviews.title: Good place to put those knives you use most often
customer_reviews.text: This provides you with a convenient place to store the knives you use on a daily basis. Not large enough to hold more than three (at least for me), but that is a small issue (no pun intended). Three month update: I have down graded my vote by one because of the scratches it leaves on your knives. I have what was a new knife (8" chef's) that was scratch free, until it went into this holder. Now with three months of use, it has fine scratches down the length of both sides. Since I wash and dry the knives BEFORE inserting in the holder, I'm not near as happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Pat-inCO

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: As expected and I really like it. I was looking at this one and another brand (in the similar products section). We have a few CUTCO knives that we use everyday and a random collection of others. This fits them all and we have room for more if we'd like to add. People ask about scissors in the questions (I had the same question) so I tested it (see 2nd & 3rd pic). If the scissors are thin enough, they will fit in. Typical kitchen scissors with wider handles won't fit well. You'll need two hands to get them out though (which I would recommend using anyway). While the product will most likely not tip, it's not that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Matto84

customer_reviews.title: Works for My Limited Space
customer_reviews.text: I have limited counter space so a traditional knife block was out, this is better than I expected. Holds 6 knives, couple of butcher, slicing, boning and a couple of paring, comfortably. I could get by with 3 knives, but hate to leave the others in drawer. Tall enough to handle my Old Hickory slicing knife, but keep in mind you need clear space above to pull knives out. I am happy, What does drive me crazy is they, Amazon, asks for reviews before you have had long enough to realistically evaluate.
customer_reviews.author: SteveJG

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually only us magnetic knife strips drilled into the walls, however, when we moved into our new apartment there was no place to do that. This knife block in WONDERFUL, small, sleek and easy to clean. I have 6 Wusthof knives and two other large knives in there and they fit beautifully! Also, I feel like my knives wont dull as fast with wood blocks due to the curved edges you slip the knives between.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: A versatile and accommodating design.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this fits in, my kitchen is rather traditional but this doesn't take up much space and the stainless steel isn't obtrusive. It's also tall enough to fit the couple of knives I wanted to protect and keep off the counter in case the grand kids are over and it doesn't tip. I haven't had to yet but the way it's designed will make it easy to clean when needed. It is flexible enough to allow you to arrange your knives as you see fit and the lifetime guarantee makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Herron

customer_reviews.title: beautiful product. Love flexibility to put knives easily into ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful product. Love flexibility to put knives easily into it thanks to total flexibility of slots. Have retired my wood block knife holder which took up so much room but didn't fit any knife replacements. I've pared my knives to 2 essential + 3 sort of backups. Getting used to having a really good prep knife reduced my needs. also found a great home for my super sharp prepper with this purchase. marvelous engineering!
customer_reviews.author: happy2share

customer_reviews.title: The Quality of the Plastic Top
customer_reviews.text: The design is ok but the manufacturing quality (injection moulding) can be improved. The plastic top can come out easily when you pull a thick knife out from one of the slots. There is a tiny piece of broken plastic inside the block when unboxing the item and it looks like a broken piece from the plastic top so the same issue again.
customer_reviews.author: NMo

customer_reviews.title: Looks sleek and not your typical knife holder
customer_reviews.text: Although this may not be the MOST practical knife holder bc The knives sit a little loosely in the holder and top heavy with my large good knives (maybe I just need more of them, haha) but it looks awesome!!!! It's not big and bulky, it doesn't have a logo on it and it matches my appliances. I get so many complements on it and overall it gets the job done. I am extremely happy with this product bc it works decently and just looks amazing. Nice and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: johnna taranto

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to open the bottom for cleaning. Knives have to be inserted vertically for storage and different handles are left outsides, which does not look in the kitchen. Also it is a tall cylinder with a relatively smaller bottom and hence may fall down if knives are not put in a balanced way. It is now sitting in the dust of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: yixinyiyi

customer_reviews.title: This is so perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect! I have been buying knifes one at a time instead of a set, so I could get just what I wanted. I wanted to keep them separate from my other knifes and easy to get to. This is a perfect choice. Looks great. It is a very sturdy, quality item. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Design and Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best kitchen items I have purchased in a long time. I was using the old style butcher block for my knifes and scissors which wasted counter space. I would highly recommend this item! (I have many large knives so the statement of holds 10 knives is only for small to medium size knives) This for me with my set holds 6 plus scissors squeezed in)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving and Stays Clean
customer_reviews.text: I find this product to be far superior to the large wooden knife holders found in most kitchens. It is small enough to sit between the faucet and blacksplash at my kitchen sink. The rubber slats hold the knives safely upright. The slats themselves have remained sturdy. It clearly defied my expectations when I discovered there was almost nothing inside the cannister when I removed the rubber top to clean it out. Whoopee! No work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mehitabel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife block for the camper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing knives in small spaces! We purchased this product to store our knives in our camper and we love it. I have attached pictures of the knife block, knives we use, and the knives in the block. There is plenty of room for several knives and the block is easy to clean! I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: PettyAdventures

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile block
customer_reviews.text: I have several knives with fairly short blades that don't fit well into the usual knife blocks. All of them fit very wwll in tthis one. It also accomodates consideralbly longer blades as well. There are already eight knives with blades of varyiing lengths tin this block and there is room for several more. This is a wonderful idea which has solved my problems. If I could rate it more tham five stars, I definitely would.
customer_reviews.author: Sekitori

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot and have many knives. I bought three of these because I got tired of needing a specific sized slot for each knife, so they didn't all fit in the wooden blocks I had. Though I was skeptical at first, I am very happy with these. The stainless steel does show fingerprints however I have no problem wiping them occasionally. Because they stand upright they don't take as much room as the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Cheleoxo

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product over a year ago and am still using it. It holds all my most needed knives just fine, and the outside is easy to clean, but there's no way to clean the slots or what might fall in between them. The only problem, however, and why I gave it three stars, is because it's too easy to tip over. I was cleaning the countertop and started to scoot it out of the way, but it tipped over, one knife slid out and sliced right into my other hand as I reached to right it. Ouch. Stitches. I'm much more careful now, but I would worry if there are children in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen G.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded expectations. Effectively holds more than expected number of knives. Easy to insert and remove them. Is attractive sitting on counter and is of high quality stainless steel. Is heavy enough to remain stable even with a large number of knives with heavy handles are inserted.
customer_reviews.author: Dixiepuddin

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of knives
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like i can get more knives in it that the standard wood block. I just have to tilt it down to get the big knives out as the standard 18 inch space form countertop to cabinets doesn't allow me to just pull straight out which I don't mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well to hold knives of all sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Interesting design with the plastic slots for placing knifes. We have used it for a few months now. Works well. You can remove the plastic insert to wash it if you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Not my dog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife block
customer_reviews.text: This knife block is really nice and holds many knives of different sizes. So far I’ve had no issues with it tipping over. I love that it doesn’t take up much space and can be easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I like that the knives hang free
customer_reviews.text: I like that the knives hang free. This means that they stay cleaner and are less likely to contaminate the holder. The black top can come off and be washed on occasion as well which will help with hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Horton

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what was needed
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what was needed. I cook a lot and have limited counter space. This holder is keeping all my go-to knives for everyday cooking close buy. I was worried that I would go crazy trying to find the knife I wanted but arranged it by knife type and it's working very well. Still have the butcher block in a cupboard holding the longer and less used (but still important to me) knives. It looks good and takes very little counter space. Bought one for my son and daughter in law and I'm pretty sure they will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: CJorine

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife block to store and protect a ceramic blade knife I was buying. It looks good on the counter, and I added a few other knives which I use often. I love not having to dig through a drawer for my favorite knives!
customer_reviews.author: MARNI STRIKS

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! We love this item very much. My husband cant stop showing our guest when they come over how easy the knives fit in this container. We recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Best Way To Store Your Favorite Knives
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I purchased 2. Storing my good knives in a way that they will not get damaged is very important. In addition, safe storage is paramount. No more knives in drawers!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sleek knife block and holds many more knives than what I expected. I think I put about 12 in there. It doesn't take up nearly as much space as a typical knife block. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: The simplest solutions are often the best!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old butcher block knife holder with this and it's amazing how much less real estate this takes up on the counter and how many knives I can easily get in and out of it! It's a very simple but brilliant solution and saves a TON of space!
customer_reviews.author: sbc2556

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a small collection of Global knives that I've kept them in their original box until now. The Hiware SS knife block is perfect and fits under my kitchen counter. The block is classy and goes well with my mid-century modern design. I would buy from the seller again. The products was exactly as described and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: goglobal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was searching for. Holds more than I expected. Matches my salt and pepper and oil set. I’m delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Eyre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this universal knife block so much and especially because it is universal!! I love ito cook and use many different knives, some of them were sold with their own block, some aren't and my countertop looked messy before. Now I can organize all my knives in one small place, safely and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya Kleyman

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. This is a solid and well made knife block. It holds all different sizes knifes securely and uses only a very small footprint compared to other angles knife blocks. The stainless steele exterior matches well with stainless appliances in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: As I See It

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I needed somewhere to store my knives. I should send this back because it doesn’t store many knives. It’s difficult to remove them. It doesn’t look great on my counter like I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: EST

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Even better thant I thought. Very appealing to the eye and decrative. It goes great with the rest of the decor in my kitchen. Great concept and very safe. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great for about a month
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about a month...now I can't get my knives in at all. I am someone who is very careful with my things so I'm pretty sure it is the devise and not me. Is it too late for a refund?
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great look, Great price
customer_reviews.text: It has a Great look, and a Great price. Easy to use and lots of space for knives and other kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxontheweb

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately I didn't decide to use this product -- it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately I didn't decide to use this product -- it added to the clutter of our countertops and i worried about possible moisture building up between the knife folds... went with a magnetic strip on the fridge instead.
customer_reviews.author: Evening Bike Ride

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Beyond expectations, I think I may get another one as wood blocks attract dust and grease. New holder is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Woman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. It holds our small set of chef knives (6 knives)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Vaught

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold scissors or anything that isn’t flat.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a knife bar but our house had a tile backsplash and hubby said NO to drilling holes. New house and no backsplash but no convenient place to hang knife bar. Enter Hiware knife block!! Small, attractive and easy to reach knives next to cutting boards. Hubby likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Armbruster

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my roommate. She loves it!! It really fits any knife. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Kernodle

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nifty knife block. I was pretty happy that it held all of my knives. I don't have the room for an in-drawer knife protector or a magnetic strip so this works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Factual Actuals

customer_reviews.title: Hi ware knife block-great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed! It allows flexibility in storing knives. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Romelle G. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very clean sleek design works great for a clean counter top and easy access to knives
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this product online, I couldn’t figure out how it could hold my knives successfully, but I loved the cylinder look and the finish, so I ordered it. It holds the knives snugly but releases them smoothly, it takes up very little space, and the stainless steel finish is very attractive. I am very pleased with this purchase. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: A.  G. Kabel

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This knife block is very stylish and is the perfect small footprint on our RV countertop. It holds the stainless Ashlar knife set (also sold on Amazon) and is not top heavy as I thought it might be. I am well satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mschloe

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my wife along with two Kyocera ceramic knives. I think she likes this better than the knives...and she loves them. Cleans easily and is not too tall to go under my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Zube

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like a typical knife block.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it sit's on my countertop and does not look like the typical knife block. Very stylish and looks easy on the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J Katz

customer_reviews.title: loved this solution!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install and magnetic knife holder on my kitchen wall but my 1926 plaster was not cooperating. This canister matched nicely with my stainless steel appliances and is a very clever solution to storing large knives, scissors, and other irregular utensils like my pie server etc.
customer_reviews.author: shklee indepndnt dstrbtr melissa anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and slim. I have 11 knives in the holder with room for a couple more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous42415

customer_reviews.title: The best part is it has a smaller profile
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a wooden knife block with this. Wasn’t sure all my knives would fit, but they did, all 7 knives. The best part is it has a smaller profile. My counter appears neater than before.
customer_reviews.author: C. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great knife Holder !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, well packaged and just as described. Very functional and much more attractive on a kitchen counter than your standard knife holder. Very pleased !!!
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn M. Decollibus

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to your kitchen counter!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this knife holder! I bought it because I have young children and wanted to keep knives out of the drawer. Fits more knives than expected! Looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: The Jordans

customer_reviews.title: Takes up less space, universal
customer_reviews.text: Could be heavier to prevent tipping over when inserting or removing knives. Other than that it’s great, love that it fits knives of different brands. Takes up way less counter space than typical knife block.
customer_reviews.author: annpolan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking compact block
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife block. It fits the steak knifes I purchased very nicely. I didn't really know how it would work but the knifes can fit anywhere there is space. I have 8 knifes in it now and could probably get a few more in there too.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! Holds my knives well and is very sturdy. Came with a sweet handwritten card, always love supporting a small business that cares
customer_reviews.author: Chuck from Jursy

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this product. I have mismatched knives and not a lot of storage space, so this is perfect! Doesn't take up as much room as traditional knofe holder and holds quite a lot of knives.
customer_reviews.author: chandra roberts

customer_reviews.title: My comments
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. One for our principal residence and one for a second place we have. The product looks great, it is easy to use and the one I have had for about a year continues to look brand new. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Good Knife holder
customer_reviews.text: Is sturdy and does not topple. Its easy to put-in or take-out knives.
customer_reviews.author: VijayV

customer_reviews.title: Top and bottom pull out.
customer_reviews.text: takes up less space than the other holder that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is sleek and compact and doesn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is sleek and compact and doesn't take up a lot of space on my counter top. I had an older model knife holder that was heavy and clunky and I am so happy to have replaced it with the Hiware Stainless Steel Knife Block.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Manuel

customer_reviews.title: perfect for its use
customer_reviews.text: an excellent product....hefty enough that I don't feel it will tip over, easy to put the knives into. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if it would be cheaply made but its very nice, looks great on the counter, and can fit our 5 knives we use regularly! Definitely worth it for the price. I love how compact it is too compared to a wooden board or block
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Cabrales

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and perfect for my knives & utensils.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife canister
customer_reviews.text: What a very clever idea for storing knives! Matches my other stainless steel canisters perfectly. A real space saver.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This saved our fingers from getting cut, much more organized

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job and looks good too.
customer_reviews.text: My knives fit in the knife holder. It does it’s job as it should and matches my stainless steel kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Easy access to knives you use the most
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law and she absolutely loves it She did keep them stored in the kitchen drawer and was always scared her five-year-old daughter would reach in looking for something else and cut herself
customer_reviews.author: MEME

customer_reviews.title: Great item, very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Sufficient storage capacity, currently holding 14 knives. Easy access to knives used daily, plus freed up much needed drawer space. Convenient size and shape, requires very little space, and keeps utensils neat and organized!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Sleek, contemporary looking. Thank you. I will look to purchase from you in the future.

customer_reviews.title: excellent  product
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect size for my small kitchen counter. I can easily find which knife I need. it also matches my larger round utensil caddy. great lightning deal!!

customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a small footprint on countertop and holds all types of knives. Also like that it is stainless steel! Wooden blocks are too big and won’t clean as well. Prompt delivery!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this holds a lot of knives and looks neat and tidy

customer_reviews.text: Nice knife holder. A few of the smaller knives tilted in the holder though and didn't hold as well. Good quality holder though.

customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed - Clean design, easily holds all variety of knives while matching any stainless steel appliances. Super easy to take apart and clean, about the size (a little smaller) of a 2Liter bottle. More functional and spacious than its bamboo counterparts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for compact storage.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces. Looks neat on the counter top.

customer_reviews.title: Products came quickly and look great. Loving so far

customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but doesn’t open up for thorough cleaning as far as I can tell

customer_reviews.title: Knives fall over
customer_reviews.text: After daily usage the knife slots are wearing down. My smaller knives tip over and almost fall out. Otherwise I love this product. Wish it wasn’t wearing out already.

customer_reviews.text: I bought for the low footprint on my small kitchen counter. I love the design but the block does not have any drainage so the cleaning would have been a little more difficult.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this knife block!! I highly recommend it. It holds a wide variety and sizes of knives.I currently have 10 knives in it.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife holder!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my few mismatched, but favorite knives! And it doesn’t take much counter space!

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife block! It has a sleek design that fits the many different brands and sizes of knives I have. It also matches perfect with my other stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. I wish I would have discovered this earlier. Great quality at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Love how it doesn't take up alot of countertop

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife block!!!
customer_reviews.text: This universal knife block is beautiful, functional and surprisingly holds a lot. Perfection right here!

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Matches the stainless steel appliances in my kitchen and just freed up a bunch of drawer space in my utensil drawer. Showed up on time and is exactly what I was expecting! Would definitely order from here again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool Stores a lot more knives than a block.

product_meta.title: Hiware Stainless Steel Universal Knife Block, Round Soft Touch Knife Holder - For Safe, Space-Saver Knife Storage
feature_bullets: Made of food-grade safe plastic with stainless steel case, unique bilayer angled slots hold your knives securely without scratching the blades
The modern design waved top enables almost any size or shape of knife to be hold safely and the weighted bottom keeps it securely in place
Weighted bottom designed knife block can hold up to 12 Knives, suitable for usage in home, restaurants, cafes, kitchen etc
Easy to clean and dry, removable bottom placing it under running water which flows out of the inlet at the bottom.
An exceptional value and an excellent gift for any occasion.
